items.title: Fencing
items.text: A fence is an outdoor structure designed to enclose a property or yard, typically built with posts connected by boards or rails. Unlike a wall, a fence has support at posts rather than a continuous foundation, providing privacy, security, and aesthetic appeal. Common materials include wood, vinyl, and metal, making it a versatile choice for fencing installation.

items.title: Decking
items.text: A deck is a raised outdoor platform built for durability and heavy loads, typically attached to a home or freestanding. Common materials include wood, composite, and pressure-treated lumber, offering a stylish and functional space for outdoor living. Professional deck builders create custom designs, from floating decks to two-story structures with railings and lighting, enhancing any backyard.

items.title: Quality Materials
items.text: Whether you're planning a deck installation for your yard or looking to enhance privacy with a custom fence, the first step is choosing the type, length, and color of your materials. Our goal is to provide expert guidance on wood, composite, and pressure-treated decking, as well as fence styles, ensuring you make an informed decision for a durable, high-quality outdoor space.
